exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 1500ms", function () {

response.name: {{local}}/api/v1/person/password/reset/request

request.description:
*business*: string - The id of the business.

*type*: The transaction type ( allowed values are "CR" and "DR"

*customer*: string - optional - The customer related to the transaction.

*tnx_detail*: The transaction detail (this can also be the name of the product or a concatenation of all the product names if there are multiple items). NB: This is required if you are sending transaction(s) with a customer.

*tnx_channel*: The payment channel of the transaction. Allowed values are CASH, POS and TRANSFER

*tnx_value_date*: The date the transaction occurred (NB: Not when it was recorded). This is required if you are sending 
transaction(s) with a customer.

*transactionData.detail*": The transaction detail, only required when sending transaction without a customer attached

*transactionData.amount*": number -  The transaction(s) amount. Only required when sending transaction without a customer attached

*transactionData.channel*": string -  The transaction channel. Only required when sending transaction(s) without a customer attached. Allowed values are CASH, POS and TRANSFER

*transactionData.value_date*": date - The date the transaction occurred (NB: Not when it was recorded). This is required if you are sending 
transaction(s) without a customer. 

*deposit.deposit_amount*": number - The deposit amount. This is required on only if the transaction is a deposit.

*deposit.balance_repayment_date*": date - The expected repayment_date of the balance amount. This is required on only if the transaction is a deposit.
